Subject: Introduction
optional materials: Affine transformations (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F5WA26W4JaM), Perspective projections pt.1 (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F5WA26W4JaM), Perspective projections pt.2 (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g7Pb8mrwcJ0)

Subject: Foundation for Generative Models
optional materials: VAE [ICLR 2014] (https://arxiv.org/abs/1312.6114), GAN [2014] (https://arxiv.org/abs/1406.2661), Normalizing flows [ICML 2015] (http://proceedings.mlr.press/v37/rezende15.pdf), diffusion models [neurIPS 2020] (https://arxiv.org/abs/2006.11239)
Presentations: Introduction to Computer Graphics and Generative Models (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HgPgbqEodeC0ICkfByC-TjyWYCG3ljB0/view?usp=drive_link)

Subject: Transformers
materials: Attention is all you need  [NeurIPS 2017] (https://arxiv.org/abs/1706.03762), ViT [ICLR 2021] (https://arxiv.org/abs/2010.11929)
Presentations: Attention is all you need (https://drive.google.com/file/d/18fuATG5WCOQ_vCxQBxNuz8BctmaXG0ue/view?usp=drive_link), ViT (https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1Jk8W03v0XD46U1BQZBlz73HgNPbXL6NP/edit?usp=drive_link&ouid=104824366121127000921&rtpof=true&sd=true)

Subject: Diffusion Models
optional materials: Distillation [ICLR 2022] (https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.00512), SDE explanation [ICLR 2021] (https://openreview.net/forum?id=PxTIG12RRHS), classfier-free guidance [NeurIPS 2021 Workshop] (https://arxiv.org/abs/2207.12598)

Subject: 3D Reconstruction
optional materials: Phototourism [ACM Transactions on Graphics 2006]  (http://phototour.cs.washington.edu/Photo_Tourism.pdf), Shape and spatially-varying brdfs from photometric stereo (https://grail.cs.washington.edu/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/goldman-2005-sas.pdf)
Presentations: Optical Flow Applications Lecture (https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/12GwZeMuh1UKomGfr3Q_qGNHPaP_jU0iv/edit?usp=drive_link&ouid=104824366121127000921&rtpof=true&sd=true), ORB-SLAM2 (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EQDU53JpGi8zwK9TfD8NMlgyyuZgU3X4/view?usp=drive_link), Colmap (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1JXCT2dgbmA7xbeOwO36QP2wvFD0wAoWg/view?usp=drive_link)

Subject: Dynamic Reconstruction
optional materials: Monocular Dynamic View Synthesis: A Reality Check [NeurIPS 2022] (https://arxiv.org/abs/2210.13445), Neural Jacobian Fields [ACM Transactions on Graphics 2022]  (https://arxiv.org/abs/2205.02904)

Subject: Motion Generation
materials: motion diffusion models [ICLR 2023 ] (https://arxiv.org/abs/2209.14916), Synthesizing physical character-scene interactions (https://arxiv.org/abs/2302.00883)
Presentations: Motion Modeling Lecture (https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1-aZgi_xKxAceyC_hQWpr_D1CL46UO_QQ/edit?usp=drive_link&ouid=104824366121127000921&rtpof=true&sd=true), motion diffusion models (), Synthesizing physical character-scene interactions (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OjFOwynu4Kv1BE8DnfMqzgmFw4lAauJD/view?usp=drive_link)

Subject: Internal Learning
optional materials: Zero Shot Super-Resolution [CVPR 2018] (https://arxiv.org/abs/1712.06087), Learn from A Single Image [ICLR 2020] (https://arxiv.org/abs/1904.13132), SinGRAF [CVPR 2023] (https://arxiv.org/abs/2211.17260), SinFusion [ICML 2023] (https://yaniv.nikankin.com/sinfusion/)

Subject: Category and Pose
optional materials: Neural Congealing (https://arxiv.org/abs/2302.03956), Correspondence from Image Diffusion [2023] (https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.03881)

Subject: Parts and Wholes
materials: Detect What You Can [CVPR 2014] (https://arxiv.org/abs/1406.2031), Attentional Constellation Nets [ICLR 2021] (https://openreview.net/pdf?id=vujTf_I8Kmc)
optional materials: Semantic Understanding of Scenes [IJCV 2018] (https://arxiv.org/abs/1608.05442),  Hedging Your Bets [CVPR 2012] (https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/6248086)

Subject: Fine-grained Recognition
materials: Between-class Attribute Transfer [CVPR 2009] (https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/5206594), Attributes as Operators [ECCV 2018] (https://arxiv.org/abs/1803.09851)

Subject: Few-shot Learning
optional materials: Matching Net [neurIPS 2016] (https://arxiv.org/abs/1606.04080), Conditional Prompt Learning for Vision-Language Models [CVPR 2022] (https://arxiv.org/abs/2203.05557)

Subject: Continual Learning
materials: Overcoming Catastrophic Forgetting [PNAS 2017] (https://arxiv.org/abs/1612.00796), Robust Fine-tuning of Zero-Shot Models [CVPR 2022] (https://arxiv.org/abs/2109.01903)
optional materials: Variational Continual Learning [ICLR 2018] (https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.10628), Gradient Projection Memory [ICLR 2021] (https://arxiv.org/abs/2103.09762)
